thag2.44:1.1: “Your skin is nasty but your heart is good;
thag2.44:1.2: Mogharāja, you’re always immersed in samādhi.
thag2.44:1.3: But in the nights of winter, so dark and cold,
thag2.44:1.4: how will you get by, monk?”
thag2.44:2.3: I’ll make my bed under a thatched roof,
thag2.44:2.4: just like those who live in comfort.”
